name: Classic Hotel
detail: Wonderful hotel with best hospitality. Including all the entertainments. Rooms were clean. Very friendly staff. Many clubs inside the hotel premises. Many spas too. Beautiful dancing ladies and live DJ events everyday. Massive hotel all together. Very tasty breakfast too. This hotel is the best hotel in Jakarta. 10 out of 10.

name: Holiday Inn & Suites Jakarta Gajah Mada By IHG
detail: After a few dodgy 4* hotels in Jakarta booked previously, this one is definitely my favourite. Staff was great and attentive, my room was spacious and ultra clean, food in the restaurant was superb, I really cannot complain. Loved it.

name: Hotel GranDhika Iskandarsyah
detail: This 4 star hotel is still new. Well maintained, elegant interrior and clean but a deluxe room is slightly small. Most of the staff are friendly and helpful, except the receptionist who checked us in, displayed cold first impression. It is located at a most convenient spot, within reach to all the famous shopping blocks, Pasar Raya, Blok M Plaza, Blok M Mall, in just between 10 to15 mins walk. This hotel provided a very fast free wifi compared to most of others 4 star hotels in Indonesia. Breakfast are moderate, with few local selections. Different menus on day today should be introduced, to start our day more exciting.

name: Grand Anara Airport Hotel
detail: The front desk staff was efficient and welcoming.
area: Soekarno-Hatta International Airport,Jakarta - View on map

name: Vertu Harmoni Jakarta
detail: Harris Vertu hotel is something that outshines all the other hotels in the area. Located in Central Jakarta this hotel makes it easy to get to national landmarks like the Monas, Nayional Musuem and gallery and the Central Park area. Me and my partner arrived late to check out after so km e difficulties at the airport and Harris Hotel booked out the last standard room already and gave us a free upgrade without any issues at all. We collapsed as soon as we got to the room and the bed is incredibly comfortable and inviting. The room although small in size felt really big in actually because our room was situated in the corner of the hotel where we had two big windows to look out too thr city every morning and evening. We Not make much of the pool and other facilities such as pool and the spa was booked the last day we tried to use it. We went out during our 4 night stay so it was Not a big deal. I do have some smalls cons to point out. Bathroom: Sliding doorway and mirror is one and is behind the sink which Made it difficult to See full body in mirror. Dine in room service: of the few times we Did order room serverice they only got it half right. I think this is a miscommunication issue because we had to repeat our order several time. I think some of the staff have limited English capabilities. Also there are no vegetarian options on their menu you have to call to order/amend the menu which was frustrating at times because of miscommunication. Location: although it is close to many national landmarks it is not that close to many restaurants. Pros: Dine in Service: they were still open to accommodate to my vegetarian needs. Location: Close to grand indonesia mall and landmarks. I would glady stay at Harris Vertu again if I am in Jakarta and recommend others to do so.

name: ARTOTEL Thamrin Jakarta
detail: I've stayed twice at Atotel. When I was looking for hotels I came across this hotel, hmm.. Interesting concept. I booked & I have not regretted choosing Artotel. When I entered Artotel I was like WOW! The smell was so fresh & nice. I luv the deco. I myself luv arts. I think it's really great they came up with this getting few artist to paint in the rooms..thruout the hotel. I was telling myself I wished Malaysia had something like this. The food.. I had breakfast & it wasn't that great. I think they need to improve. I ordered the room service chicken wings...that was nice. There are times I'm sure some guest who are so tired would like to stay in their room, order room service, relax... Laundry..I snd my white blouse & few others for a wash.. My white blouse came back in light baby blue color & it wasn't iron properly & same as the rest too... I told d staff about it & they apologise.. Most hotels I've stayed when I ask for iron they give me the usual normal iron but at Artotel it's steam iron. I prefer steam iron as it's easier for me. At Artotel they think of everything they could to make it easier for their guest. In Indonesia their plug is different than Malaysia or in England so they made sure they had that install so the guest don't really need to buy an adapter. You can't expect everything to be perfect at all the hotels, even at a 5 or 6 star hotels you get some faulty too. Sometime things do happen. Besides that I really do like Artotel. It's one of my favourite hotel in Jakarta. I would definitely stay at Artotel again & I highly recommend this hotel to anyone.

name: Millennium Hotel Sirih Jakarta
detail: The cleanliness and value for money were also exceptional.

name: Manhattan Hotel Jakarta.
detail: I have been very surprised to see how this hotel can compete with all the other 5-stars hotels in Jakarta. The price is very good for an incredible quality/price ratio. The security is very efficient. the rooms are spacious and be bed very comfortable. The design in the room has been carefully selected and one of the major good points is the availability of the 24/7 restaurant. The hotel is well located in Casablanca near the Ambassador's mall. The breakfast is excellent and give a large choice of different kind of food. I highly recommend this hotel for any travelers who would like to stay 1 or more nights in Jakarta.

name: Kosenda Hotel
detail: I love this hotel so much. I am so glad I get to experience this place. I got the petit room. Yes it is small but they maximized the space with everything you need and the attention to every detail of the room is just mesmerizing. This, by far, is the best affordable hotel in Jakarta. I have stayed in more expensive hotels in Jakarta but nothing beats how amazing my experience was. Yes the place is tiny but is very much worth it.

name: The Orient Jakarta, a Royal Hideaway Hotel
detail: A thoughtful welcome gift in the room added a special touch.
